title: IMAGE 1
caption: Ocean surface conditions in Irminger Sea during winter photographed from the deck of an Oceanographic Research Vessel. Do you see any evidence of wind forcing on the ocean surface in the picture?

title: IMAGE 2
caption: Longitudinal cross-section of the Atlantic Ocean showing water masses and depth. What does this imply about the relative density of the NADW and AABW water masses? (Credit: Image from Physical Geology by Steven Earle used under a CC-BY 4.0 international license.)

title: IMAGE 3
caption: Location map showing geographic location of Irminger Sea. Where in the world are we?
